attributes.action: Evoke The Recall of MPs Act 2015 (c. 25) against North Devon MP Selaine Saxby.
attributes.additional_details: After the Majority of UK MPs voted against feeding hungry children over the winter with free school meals, local North Devon independently owned businesses stepped up to do the job by offering free meals to families in need. Selaine Saxby responded to this through a Facebook group and was once again inappropriate and cold.
attributes.background: Remove the North Devon MP Selaine Saxby after even more inappropriate comments online.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for MPs to be subject to a recall vote.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Amend the Recall of MPs Act 2015 to allow communities sole power to recall MPs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548400
